Compounds
Etymology 1
Noun
Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|洋の東%西を問わず|よう の とう%ざい を とわず}}: “regardless of east or west of the [[ocean]]” → in either the East or the West → anywhere in the [[world]], all over the world

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なだ}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=なだ|-}}.  Found in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', completed some time after 759 {{CE}}.<ref>{{RQ:Manyoshu|17|3893}}, text [http://jti.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/manyoshu/Man17Yo.html#3893 here]</ref>

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|ひろし}}

[[nominalization|Nominalization]] of the {{m|ja|終止形||tr=shūshikei|terminal form}} of classical [[adjective]] {{m|ja|広し|tr=hiroshi}}, modern {{m|ja|広い|tr=hiroi||[[vast]], [[wide]]}}.
